item.title: About this websites
item.description: About this websites This websites is a place to share and memorize what I have learned, experienced, and played in my life. Design I focus on things below to build this websites. 😀Modern We will try to experiment with new technologies as much as possible on this page. For example, we currently use Avif as our image format. 🦚Beautiful This websites has simple Beautiful light/dark mode UI. Enjoy! ⚡Fast I belive fast loading is so important.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: アクセス解析ツールについて 当サイトでは、Googleによるアクセス解析ツール「Googleアナリティクス」を利用しています。 このGoogle
